% List of known fails.
% The list is unordered and contains information about commonly used platforms / configurations.
% Our goal is to maintain this list for Linux, macOS and Windows with reasonably new compilers.
% Note, that it's important which C++ compiler was used.
% Please also note that it's very important to have correctly built LLVM. There are a number of
% LLVM bugs in released versions, that we have to workaround by applying patches (see llvm_patches
% folder). The recommended way to build LLVM on Unix is to use "alloy.py".
%
./tests/func-tests/clock.ispc runfail    xe64      xelpg-x8 mtl_presi   Linux LLVM 15.0 clang++15.0 O2 spv *
./tests/func-tests/idiv-int16.ispc runfail    xe64      xelpg-x8 mtl_presi   Linux LLVM 15.0 clang++15.0 O2 spv *
./tests/func-tests/idiv-int32.ispc runfail    xe64      xelpg-x8 mtl_presi   Linux LLVM 15.0 clang++15.0 O2 spv *
./tests/func-tests/idiv-uint16.ispc runfail    xe64      xelpg-x8 mtl_presi   Linux LLVM 15.0 clang++15.0 O2 spv *
./tests/func-tests/idiv-uint32.ispc runfail    xe64      xelpg-x8 mtl_presi   Linux LLVM 15.0 clang++15.0 O2 spv *
./tests/func-tests/clock.ispc runfail    xe64      xelpg-x16 mtl_presi   Linux LLVM 15.0 clang++15.0 O2 spv *
